title: N=8 Supergravity in Central Charge Superspace
abstract: We present a new geometrical description of N=8 supergravity, using central charge superspace. The essential properties of the multiplet, like self-duality properties of the vectors or the non-linear sigma model structure of the scalars, appear in a natural way in this formulation. We also present in detail how to deduce from this geometrical formulation the supergravity transformations as well as the equations of motion for the component fields in order to compare them with the results already known and obtained in formulations on the component level.
